are_you_sure_you_want_to_delete_this_pro: Are you sure you want to delete this product? It cannot be undone.
continue_to_edit: Continue to edit the farm page at any time
create_farm_using_link: Create your farm page in one step using link!
enjoy_the_simplicity_and_charm_of_farm_l: Enjoy the simplicity and charm of farm life with FarmLiaison.
hello_farmer_name_i_am_interested_in_you: Hello {0}, I am interested in your farm that I saw on FarmLiaison. I would like to be contacted to schedule a visit.
join_farmliaison_to_discover_g: Join FarmLiaison to discover genuine farm experiences across the globe. Explore sustainable agriculture and connect with local farmers for an unforgettable journey into agritourism.
lets_get_back_to_the_roots_together: Let's get back to the roots together!
name: Name
the_information: The information you share will be used across FarmLiaison to help other guests and Farmers get to know you.
message_from: you have got a message from
user_message_to_farmer: A user has sent a message to you
get_in_touch: Get in touch with the FarmLiaison team and we'll get back to you and help as soon as we can!
ai_profile_creation: How does AI-powered profile creation work?
ai_profile_creation_answer: Just provide some basic details about your farm such as name, location, short description, activities, and products. Our AI will automatically generate a beautiful, detailed profile in multiple languages, ensuring your farm appeals to a global audience.
edit_ai_descriptions: Can I edit the AI-generated descriptions?
edit_ai_descriptions_answer: Yes, you can! While our AI provides a strong base to start from, you can always tweak and personalize the content to better reflect your farm’s unique aspects.
ai_supported_languages: What languages does the AI support for profile descriptions?
ai_supported_languages_answer: Our AI supports multiple major languages, making it easier for farmers to reach eco-tourists from various linguistic backgrounds. This list is continuously expanding to include more languages.
ai_translation_accuracy: How accurate are the AI translations and descriptions?
ai_translation_accuracy_answer: We use advanced AI technology designed for high accuracy and cultural relevance. However, if there are any nuances or specific details you’d like to adjust, you can easily edit the descriptions as needed.
provide_webaddress: Please provide your farm's website, if you have one, to help us generate a tailored description.
subject: Log in to FarmLiaison

click_the_button_below_to_log_in_to_your: Click the Magic Link button below to log in to your FarmLiaison account:
connecting_farms_with_those_who_seek_sim: Connecting farms with those who seek simplicity and nature
this_magic_link_is_valid_for_a_limited_t: This Magic Link is valid for a single use and will expire shortly. If you didn’t request this, you can safely ignore this email—no action is needed.
if_the_button_above_doesnt_work: If the button above doesn’t work, copy and paste the following URL into your browser:
if_you_received_this_you_tried_to_regist: If you received this email, your email address was used to request access to FarmLiaison.
